title: Players With The Biggest Gaps Between ADP & Projection
description:
Field Yates, Mike Clay, Stephania Bell and Daniel Dopp take a look at some of the top QBs, RBs and WRs who have a big gap between their fantasy projections and ADP. Plus, we take a look at the betting odds for who will lead the league in passing, rushing and receiving.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Field Yates, Stephania Bell, Mike Clay, Daniel Dopp
itunes:subtitle: Fantasy Focus: What Players' Fantasy Projections Do Not Match Their ADP This Season?
